data.name: Orc
data.description:
Orc

Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Bloodlust (+15% attack rate to 1 unit)
Purge (removes buffs from 1 unit)
Chain Lightning (175 damage to 6 units)

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Paralysis Aura
auras.description:
-20% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Static Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+8 unit armor
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Frostwolf Elites [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Burning Oil

Reduces spell damage to Grunt, Scout, Shaman, Wolf Rider and Frost Wolf by 20%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Orb of Lightning [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Power Overwhelming

Increases Grunt, Shaman and Wolf Rider attack rate by 5% and gives them 10%/13%/16%/19% chance to deal 30/35/40/45 damage up to 4 units.
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Magic Damage

upgrades.name: Discharge
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Increases chance to 10%
Increases damage to 30

bonuses.name: Shadow Wolf [D]

+50 HP

(2x damage to Heroes)
(attacks cannot miss)

Arcanite Armor
Battle Frenzy
Endurance Aura
Feral Beasts

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Merchant
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

(can affect mechanical units)

spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Frenzy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage after a kill
Affects: Frost Wolf, Grunt, Scout and Wolf Rider
(affects Thrall's and Rexxar's summons)

Lv1: +12% damage for 30 sec
Lv2: +24% damage for 60 sec
Lv3: +36% damage for 90 sec
Lv4: +48% damage for 120 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Seasoned Troops
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: hit points and regeneration
Affects: Grunt, Scout and Shaman

Lv1: +25 HP, +2 HP/s
Lv2: +50 HP, +4 HP/s
Lv3: +75 HP, +6 HP/s
Lv4: +100 HP, +8 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Slow Poison
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time
Affects: Scout and Guard Tower
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 10 sec
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 12 sec
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 14 sec
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Hunter Instincts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: max damage and ensnare
Affects: Scout and Wind Rider
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +5/+9 max damage, 5 sec ensnare
Lv2: +10/+18 max damage, 10 sec ensnare
Lv3: +15/+27 max damage, 15 sec ensnare
Lv4: +20/+36 max damage, 20 sec ensnare

towerUpgrades.name: Endurance Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: speed to nearby units
Affects: Frost Wolf and Wolf Rider

Lv1: +5% speed in 400 AoE
Lv2: +10% speed in 450 AoE
Lv3: +15% speed in 500 AoE
Lv4: +20% speed in 550 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Feral Beasts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: evasion and regeneration
Affects: Frost Wolf, Wolf Rider and Wind Rider
(affects Thrall's and Rexxar's summons)

Lv1: +5% evasion, +2 HP/s
Lv2: +10% evasion, +4 HP/s
Lv3: +15% evasion, +6 HP/s
Lv4: +20% evasion, +8 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Burning Oil
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and -10% attack rate
Affects: Wind Rider and Catapult
(affects buildings only)
(can ignite buildings in large area)

Lv1: 4 damage/sec for 30 sec
Lv2: 6 damage/sec for 35 sec
Lv3: 8 damage/sec for 40 sec
Lv4: 10 damage/sec for 45 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Power Overwhelming
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and 1 sec stun
Affects: Shaman
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +5% attack rate, 10% to do 20 damage
Lv2: +10% attack rate, 15% to do 40 damage
Lv3: +15% attack rate, 20% to do 60 damage
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 25% to do 80 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Wolf Bonding
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can detect invisible in 900 AoE)

Lv1: has Ravage (20% critical strike)
deals 2x/2.5x/3x/3.5x damage
(affects organic non-Hero units only)
Lv2: has Feral Roar (bonus damage)
+15%/+20%/+25% damage in 500 AoE
(affects organic units only)
Lv3: has Tasty Morsel (heal on kill)
heals 450/600 HP
(affects organic units only)
Lv4: has Cleaving Attack (area damage)
15% damage in 150 AoE

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Lightning Storm [X]
t2spell.description:
Creates a lightning storm over your base.
Deals 300 damage every 3 sec for 18 sec.
(has 3 sec delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Lightning Storm [X]
skills.description:
Creates a lightning storm over your base.
Deals 300 damage every 3 sec for 18 sec.
(has 3 sec delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: The Horde - Orc
skills.description:
Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Bloodlust (+15% attack rate to 1 unit)
Purge (removes buffs from 1 unit)
Chain Lightning (175 damage to 6 units)

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

skills.name: Slow Poison (Lv1)
skills.description:
Deals 6 damage/sec for 10 seconds.

(affects organic units only)
(has half duration on Heroes)

barrack.description:

Can train Heroes
+750 hit points
+2 armor
+7% unit spawning rate
+1 Melee Unit
+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Beastmaster
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Deafening Roar (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Windfury (Self Spell)
140-200% AS bonus after a kill
(has 4 sec duration)

Ogre's Blood (Passive Skill)
35% to block 30-60 damage

Feral Spirit (Summoning Spell)
summons Bear for 30-90 sec

heroes.name: Train Blademaster
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
35% to do 3-4.5x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Mirror Image (Self Spell)
2 illusions for 18-30 sec
(illusions deal no damage)

Retaliation (Passive Skill)
30% for 180-240 AoE damage
(when attacked by Heroes)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
30-40% to evade an attack

heroes.name: Warchief
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Chain Lightning (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage, 6-12 units

Feral Spirit (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Wolves for 30-60 sec

Paralysis Aura (Disable Aura)
22-40% move speed reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Lightning Storm (Damage Spell)
30-60 damage/sec for 10 sec
(300-600 area of effect)

skills.name: Paralysis Aura - [Level 1]
skills.description: Reduces nearby enemy units' movement speed by 22%.

heroes.name: Ogre Giant
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9 sec stun
(300-600 area of effect)

Bloodlust (Self Spell)
20-40% attack rate bonus

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
10-16% for 200 area damage

Beast's Strength (Passive Skill)
24-30% to block an attack
